General.Name: Agabang&Company
General.Description: Agabang&Company develops, produces, and sells baby clothes and supplies, and toys in South Korea. The company also offers women clothes. It offers its products under the AGABANG, Etowa, DEARBABY, EYAEYAO, Futo, Next Mom, and Etoi brands. It also exports its products to the United States, China, Europe, and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Bon-Chul  Gu
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Sr. Managing Director and Director
